The Professional Child Care College started its life in 1991 and has been offering students quality education in child care with a broad range of courses and qualifications to choose from for a career in child care.
 
The training is of the highest quality and the college is accredited by the ETDP SETA to run skills development programs and SAQA to offer the FET certificate in Early Childhood Development with a National Qualification Framework (NQF) level 4 and level 5.
 
The College is also an affiliated member of The International Nanny Association with training aligned to the INA’s international standards.
The College has been awarded a B-BBEE Exemption Certificate with B-BBEE Procurement level: 4 and Contribution Level: 100%.

Name: Production Management Institute of Southern Africa (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Our vision is to positively change the lives of the individuals and businesses we engage with. We commit ourselves to the process of auditing, consulting and project managing human capital development solutions that work.

PMI plays an active part in the national government’s priority to address the national skills inequalities that are causal to unemployment, poverty, underemployment, inequitable remuneration and low productivity.

Name: Prodigy Business Services (Pty) Ltd
Description: Prodigy is staffed with a multi-disciplinary team of qualified professionals and skilled RPL support teams, all of whom have considerable practical experience in the sphere of skills development. Decisions on many developments and important strategic matters are based on the recommendations emanating from our work. This gives testament to the pragmatic and practical value, which planners, directors, stakeholders in the public and private sectors place on the skills services we provide.

Name: Pro-Active Assessment and RPL College (Pty) Ltd
Description: Pro-Active Public Services College offers a wide range of training solutions aimed at national and provincial spheres of government. We offer consultation on effective training solutions, material development and operational efficiencies that will optimise workplace performance.

Name: Primeserv Training (Pty) Ltd t/a iCOLLEGE
Description:
iCOLLEGE previously known as Stanford College has been established since 1997.
We provide career guidance, top quality courses at affordable prices and we have a secure and socially active environment at our campuses.
Small interactive classes.
Face to face facilitation.
Bursaries and Student loans available.
Fully accredited courses.
Flexible full-time and part-time study options.
iCOLLEGE offers accredited and skills-based training with National SETA accredited courses and International courses available.

Name: Pretoria Technical College (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Founded in 1998, the Pretoria Technical College has an impressive history of pioneering education and research, with a particular emphasis on 'education for the professions'. The Pretoria Technical College is also regarded as one of the SA’s leading Private FET Colleges with a National reputation for academic excellence. Our courses are rated as either ‘first class’ or nationally recognized’.


Today we are a principal centre of excellence in many disciplines, including Ancillary HealthCare, Business, Engineering, Media, Information Technology, Policing and many more - as we strive to prepare our students for the challenges of the 21st century. As one of the South African’s top FET College, we are furthering knowledge with strategic partners countrywide and we intend to double our research in the years to come. Pretoria Technical College offers a unique environment where students from diverse background can build their education on a lifetime of learning and use that diversity as an asset to the classroom.

Name: Polokwane Technology Institute (Pty) Ltd
Description:
It is with great pleasure that I welcome you to Polokwane Technology Institute, Republic of South Africa. This is our official website!. Polokwane Technology Institute(Pty)Ltd was founded in 2010, a significant year in RSA and Africa as a whole. PTI is located in the city of Polokwane in the Limpopo province of the Republic.
PTI is provisionally accredited with UMALUSI Council for quality assurance in General and Further Education and Training till August 2014: Accreditation Number: FET00807PA. All our N4-N6 programmes are accredited with Quality Council for Trades & Occupations (QCTO), Number: QCTO NATED/13/0043 till 30 March 2017.

POLOKWANE TECHNOLOGY INSTITUTE (PTY) LTD IS REGISTERED WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION WITH EXAMINATION CENTER STATUS TILL 31ST DECEMBER 2019.Registration Number: 2013/FE07/004

Further more, we are offering SASSETA Approved qualifications with Afric Policing Assessment Center.Our students are offered a broad based and balance education that prepares them for leadership position in future:

Name: Pest Management Academy (Pty) Ltd
Description: PMA is proud to announce the launch of the much anticipated “Pest Management Operators Guide”. The South African pest control industry now have at its disposal an in depth reference guide that has full colour illustrations of pests that are common to South Africa.

Name: Pest Control Service Industries Board (PCSIB)
Description:
AgriSETA creates and promotes opportunities for social, economic and employment growth for agri-enterprises through relevant, quality and accessible education, training and development in both primary and secondary agriculture, in conjunction with other stakeholders in agriculture.

The scope of AgriSETA covers the agricultural sector from input services to the farm, activities on the farm and the first level processing activities from the farm.

Name: Pax Commercial College (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Founded in 1991 and this year celebrating over 25 years of academic excellence, Pax College has established itself as one of the leading Private Tertiary Education Institutes in KwaZulu-Natal.

Our strong values and ideologies ensure that we stay focused and committed to providing formal tertiary education and training that produces professional, competent and confident graduates.

Our courses are structured not only to meet national and international standards but also to target specific industry needs. We aim to nurture our students’ intelligence and broaden their outlook on life, equipping them with the vital skills and qualifications needed to respond to the ever changing industry needs.

Pax College education solely revolves around the word “practicality”, and it is this practicality that will ensure a positive response from the industry in the form of a job reservation.

Name: Pasquaule Hairdressing Academy (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Pasquale Hairstylists has been a successful hairdressing business since 1972. We have always been totally committed to education and in 2004 we decided to start a formal academy. Our objective was to train our salon students to be accomplished hairstylists which we would not hesitate to employ at Pasquale Hairstylists should there be a vacancy. Presently all our Pasquale Stylists, other than the owners, have come through the Pasquale ranks and have been trained by Pasquale.

We have a 450 square meter salon which works hand in hand with our academy which is only 1km away from the salon, to create successful hairstylists. Our salon is large enough to employ all our students and this enables the student to do both the academy hours and salon hours under the Pasquale umbrella which gives us complete control over the student reaching his/her full potential and becoming the best hairstylist possible. There is a Mentoring System in place in the salon with each qualified hairstylist committed to training their students.

Name: P Ryf and Associates (Pty) Ltd t/a Hydro International
Palabora Mining Company
Description: Palabora Copper (Pty) Limited, a subsidiary of Palabora Mining Company Ltd,is a copper mine that also operates a smelter and refinery complex based in the town of Phalaborwa, in South Africa's Limpopo Province. The mine owes its origins to a unique rock formation in the region known as the Palabora Igneous Complex.

Name: P & L Hardware (Pty) Ltd
Description: P&L HARDWARE is a family business that started in 1982 with one store. In 1996 the second generation took over, headed by André Prinsloo (junior). Between then and now, the group has grown to 45 corporate stores, and was acquired by Cashbuild in 2016.

Name: Oxbridge Academy (Pty) Ltd
Description: As an established private distance learning college, Oxbridge Academy gives you the opportunity to study a wide range of courses from home, whether you are living in South Africa, or abroad. Our distance learning model makes it possible for you to gain job-relevant skills by studying your course on a part-time basis from home.

Name: Africa Institute of Management and Technology (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Some fifty years ago in 1958, a successful businessman, Mr. Harold Morcombe (1915-2006) struggled to save three Cape Town manufacturing companies from bankruptcy. He identified the root cause of the problem, namely ‘management incompetence’ at both first-line and middle management levels which was endemic throughout all three companies.

Unable to identify any suitable local management training courses aimed at ‘practicing’ managers, he decided to set up a non-racial, not-for-profit, organization based upon the same principles adopted by the Institute of Management (UK), now the Chartered Management Institute.

Together with the three founding business CEO’s—they collectively donated £5000.00 out of their own pockets to start the enterprise—and hence the SAIM was born.

Name: Africa School of Missions
Description:
Through exciting and innovative training programmes, ASM creates opportunities to develop the heart, head, and hands of programme participants.
 
 
 
   Opportunities are created for you to gain valuable hands-on ministry and missions experience through practical outreach into both local and international communities.

Name: Omni HR Consulting (Pty) Ltd
Description: Omni HR Consulting provides business and people development solutions through training and consulting services.  Our primary focus is to provide our customers both innovative, relevant and industry-related training and development solutions which will meet their skills development needs. Our credibility is based on the fact that we operate within the framework of the Sector Education and Training Authority (SETA) landscape.

Name: South African Institute for Entrepreneurship
Description: The South African Institute for Entrepreneurship (SAIE) helps to address poverty and unemployment through entrepreneurially focused initiatives. The institute was born out of the Triple Trust Organisation (TTO) in 1996 in recognition of the critical need for easily accessible business literacy training materials for both the small enterprise sector and for schools.

The College consists of a head office and at a present three campuses, namely: Sovenga Campus, Giyani Campus and Thohoyandou Campus

Name: South African Real Estate Academy (Pty) Ltd
Description:
The South African Real Estate Academy is based in Durban, with a national infrastructure serving all the main centres. Our primary focus is real estate training, but generic courses are also offered.

SAREA offers a full range of education and training courses for estate agents. This includes RPL and full training towards the new legislated qualifications, as well as short courses in specific areas like property law, sales and marketing, financial skills, and personal development. We have also introduced online learning that will make becoming qualified accessible and user-friendly!

SAREA is fully accredited to offer the courses on hand – for more information, click here.

Name: Tirhani Skills Training (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Tirhani started as a Close Corporation on the 30th September 1999 and registered as a private company in 2005. In 2008 Tirhani Skills Training and Skills for Africa merged and now trade as Tirhani Skills for Africa.

Tirhani and its partnership with Desto (Pty) Ltd, a major shareholder, provides access to various education, training and development interventions within the broader Forestry industry and outside the industry such as New Venture Creation, Project Management , Construction, Agriculture etc.

Name: Tjeka Training Matters
Description: TJEKA conducts training to develop a competent and productive workforce, contributing to clients meeting scorecard requirements for managerial, supervisory, entrepreneurial development and technical skills on projects throughout South Africa and neighbouring countries.

Name: Tlharihani Training Centre (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Tlharihani FET College is an education training and development institution which offers of business and technical skills training, the purpose of the institution is to equip historical disadvantaged individuals with business and technical skills training that will enable learners/ graduators  to be employable or start and manager their own business. The institution is located at Mamaila/ Phaphadi village Giyani main road next to Vahlavi bricks it is located + and – 25km from Giyani town and greater Letaba municipality/ Deviskloof. The college is started in 2002 is also the institution which is accredited from the following sectors department of education.

Name: Tourism and Business Institute of South Africa
Description:
Conveniently situated in the lower Mowbray area, the Tourism & Business Institute of South Africa offers all the facilities required to provide an unparalleled learning environment. 

The six lecture rooms provide enough facilities for over 150 students. The Institute is served by lecturers of impeccable standing in the industry who bring their expertise and experience to the various curricula. Also, luminaries from the business and hospitality world including well known lecturers from across the continent are regularly featured at the Institute.

Name: Training and Resources in Early Education

Name: Training at work
Description: Training Work delivers a range of training and development programmes that are aimed at developing the competencies and capabilities of young people, local communities; unemployed, corporate agencies and officials in local government and local development agencies .Through our accreditation status we have managed to create number of SMME’s in South Africa.

Name: Trinity Technical College & Engineering Services (Pty) Ltd
True Harvest Trading (Pty) Ltd
Description:
True Harvest College is a Skills Training Institution which offers a variety of National Certificates and Deplomas (viz. Bussiness,IT,Police and Traffic, Engineering,etc.)which are monitored and quality assured by Umalusi, Sector Education and Training Authorities(SETAS),and aqlso by the National Department of Education. 
True harvest also offers the National Certificate-Vocational,the minimum entry requirement of which is a Grade 09 report. 
The college also has a driving school which afford our students to get their licenses at a dicounted price.

Name: Tshwane City College (Pty) Ltd
Description: Tshwane City College was established in 2008 ,We are proud that since the inception of the institution more than 2000 learners have successfully completed courses in various fields and many of them have either found employment or have resultantly gained promotions at their workplaces. Tshwane City College offers an excellent opportunity for students to interact with the prospective employers and leading business entrepreneurs within South African & abroad. Over the duration of their courses, students engage in various research activities, which adequately prepare them for the job market.

Name: Tshwane College of Commerce and Computer Studies (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Tshwane College was established by a group of current and former university lecturers and professors. Their aim is to provide high quality education to students in order to prepare them for a brighter future.
The foundation of Tshwane College is excellent in preparing students to be productive responsible citizens.
This is achieved by providing quality education in cooperation with family and community. The college espouses the values of a solid work ethic, good citizenship and a sense of morality that supports the community’s values.
Students are encouraged to develop a sense of responsibility that enables them to be both self-disciplined and self-reliant. The instruction offered to students provides them with the skills necessary to compete and achieve success in the academic and non-academic fields.

Name: Tshwane Institute of Technology (Pty) Ltd
Description: This band of education and training is also referred to as ‘post-school’, meaning that it refers to education and training that takes place after leaving school, even if only with a Grade 9 completed.  The only age restriction for a person wishing to study at FET level is that the person should be 16 years or older.  The target student group is therefore responsible senior adolescents and adults who are serious about following an education and training programme with a view to acquiring marketable skills.

Name: Wamalloy Engineering College (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Being one of the leading Engineering Colleges in Pretoria, the Wamalloy Engineering College is specialized in empowering the students with sound knowledge, wisdom, experience and training both in academic level and highly competitive industrial field.
We assure to impart profound knowledge and technical skills for the learners. The FET N4-N6 faculties will always be at the service of the students in clearing their doubts and shaping them as full fledged technocrats in their chosen field of education. The college offers a secured and peaceful environment established with a modern infrastructure and latest technology.

Name: White River Technical College (Pty) Ltd
Description: White River Technical College was established in the year 2000, as a Private Technical College. The focus was to provide training in Business studies from N2-N6 level, with the emphasis on Computer Training. Since the establishment of White River Technical College in 2002, hundreds of students successfully accomplished their studies. They have received combined matric subjects passed with N3 subjects passed at the institution, to get a matric certificate through UMALUSI. They have also received the National Certificates and National Diplomas at White River Technical College.

Name: Whitestone College (Pty) Ltd
Description: Whitestone College (Pty) Ltd is a Private Further Education and Training College accredited by Umalusi, Council for Quality Assurance in General & Further Education, QCTO, the Quality Council for Trades & Occupations and provisionally registered with the Department of Higher Education and Training DHET as a private Further Education & Training (FET) provider. Whitestone College is also accredited by various Sector Education and Training Authorities (SETAs), namely Health and Welfare SETA (HWSETA) for the health courses and Media, Information and Communication Technologies (MICTSETA) for Information Technology (IT) and Media Courses and Public Services SETA PSETA) for Public Administration Courses. All courses offered by Whitestone College are nationally and internationally recognised.

Name: Wilberforce Community College
Description:
Wilber force Institution was established in 1908 in Evaton, South Africa, under the auspices of the African Methodist Episcopal Church. It was founded on a parcel of land acquired from the Wildebeest Farm and deeded to the AME Church at the beginning to the last century. Similarly, in the United State of America, the AME Church was continuing its mission with the establishment of colleges, such as Wilberforce University, Morris Brown College and Payne Theological Seminary to name a few.

Wilberforce was unique in that it was founded, staffed and occupied almost exclusively by persons of African decent. There was little or no government involvement in the early years. The meagre funds that were garnered from various congregations across the United States were parlayed to build the early buildings, establish the curriculum and generally fulfil the mission of the University, referred to us “Unity with the Community”.

Name: Wispeco (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Wispeco Aluminium is the largest aluminium extruder and supplier in Africa. The company encompasses factories and distribution centres nationally. 

Wispeco strives to deliver excellent levels of quality, service and responsiveness, price competitiveness and technical support. 

Wispeco (Pty) Ltd is a wholly owned subsidiary of Remgro (Pty) Ltd, listed on the JSE. Wispeco has achieved a Level 4 BBBEE rating, which offers 100% recognition as BEE spend. 

Wispeco has been assessed through the GreenRate Green Building Scheme and was subsequently awarded EcoSpecifier accreditation on the basis of the large recycled content in its aluminium profiles.

Name: Africa Skills Training Solutions (Pty) Ltd
Description: Our range of programmes is based on the list of critical and scarce skills as identified by the South African Government, but at the same time we are constantly seeking to improve and expand on these programmes to ensure we stay current and even ahead of the ever-changing needs in the industry.

Name: African Academy for the Built Environment
Description: The African Academy for the Built Environment was founded in 1994. Two patrons, D W Macnamara and C L Yeatman realised that was a shortage of well-trained Draughtspersons and decided that something should be done about it. This resulted in the birth of the African Academy for Computer Aided Draughting with the main purpose of training Draughtspersons. With help from industry computers, software and premises (sponsored by BATEMAN) were acquired. A pilot program of 12 weeks with 8 students commenced in September 1994. This was so successful that they decided to formally launch the Academy. Three 3 staff members were appointed and recruitment of more students took place.

Name: Armar Health and Training Services (Pty) Ltd
ARWYP Training Institute (Pty) Ltd
Description:
When Arwyp Medical Centre opened its doors in May 1986, all expectations were exceeded as it soon grew into one of the biggest medical centres in the country. Due to this rapid growth as well as to the need to satisfy market expectations and to differentiate the hospital’s services from those of its competitors, it became obvious that there was a need for specialised in-house training.

The training of nurses at Arwyp began in 1996 beginning with a two year bridging programme presented in cooperation with the Ann Latsky Nursing College. As the need for adequately trained nurses became more apparent, accreditation as a nursing school was applied for and obtained. The first auxiliary nursing course commenced in January 1999. The Arwyp Training Institute was formally launched in September 2001. By December 2001, the institute had trained 24 auxiliary nurses, 5 enrolled nurses and 18 registered nurses and was well on its way to becoming the accomplished and well-recognised training facility it is today.

Name: Aurecon South Africa (Pty) Ltd
Description:
We use our thinking to provide innovative solutions. 

We bring ideas to life by partnering with you and using our innovation and expertise, with technology, to solve your complex problems. 

To find out more about what we have been up to visit our newsroom, or take a glimpse into the future on our Just Imagine blog. 

Privately owned by employees, Aurecon formed in 2009 when Africon, Connell Wagner and Ninham Shand announced the formation of a new global group.

Name: Baal-Perazim FET College (Pty) Ltd
Description: Our aim in producing this website was to create a one-stop information point where you would be able to access all the information you are likely to need in relation to training and courses we are offering.

Name: Barker Footwear (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Established in 1933, Barker Footwear has a long-standing history of shoe manufacturing that showcases true craftsmanship. The company takes pride in their mastery of traditional shoe making, using the finest materials to create footwear for distinguished men.

Through their dedication to the highest standards of quality, Barker Footwear acquired the rights to manufacture shoes under the Crockett & Jones brand in 1952.

Recognising their excellence in shoe manufacturing, Barker was acquired by Bolton Footwear, a company with its own proud history of shoe making, in 2013.

Barker Footwear has taken strides of greatness through the years, and continues to provide South African men with quality footwear defined by comfort and style.

Name: Berea Technical  College (Pty) Ltd
Description: At Berea Tech, not having a matric is not an obstacle to further study and future success. The college focuses on supporting students to achieve their dreams by offering a comprehensive range of programmes and teaching strategies especially designed and created to help them.

Name: British American  Tobacco South Africa  (Pty) Ltd
Description:
We are part of one of the world’s most international businesses, the British American Tobacco Group, which has over 200 brands sold in more than 200 markets. British American Tobacco South Africa forms part of British American Tobacco plc’s Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa (EEMEA) region, and the Southern Africa Area sub-region.

We are the largest manufacturer of cigarettes in South Africa and market more than 20 brands, including Dunhill, Kent, Rothmans and Peter Stuyvesant. Nationally, we have five world-class Trade Marketing and Distribution Centres.  Our Head Office is located in Cape Town.

Name: Brooklyn City  College (Pty) Ltd
Description: Are you seeking quality education to accomplish your dreams and future career dreams, then you have just arrived at the right college. You can contact us through e-mail, fax or telephone numbers of the campus you would like to register with.

CBM Training (Pty)  Ltd

Each of our short duration training courses is carefully researched with the market to ensure customers’ needs are identified and met. All of our training courses are of a practical nature and provide skills that are easy to implement back in the work environment.

Name: Cedars Academy for  Technical Training  (Pty) Ltd
Description: Cedars Academy for Technical Training(PTY)Ltd is a 100% Black owned, women-powered company. Cedars Academy was established in 2004 and since then, has extended its scope of programmes across multiple Sector Education and Training Authorities(SETAs).

Name: Sparrow Combined FET College

Sparrow, which first began as a Saturday morning school with 4 learners in one of Joubert Park’s church halls, had already, by 1992, established itself as The Sparrow Saturday Morning School in Braamfontein, on Juta Street. Founder, Jackie Gallagher, worked relentlessly to grow the school so that by the end of 1992, it was home to over 20 teachers and 550 learners.

By 2012 Circleway enacted a follow up College in Kriel and also expanded the scope to Business Studies.

In 2013 Circleway moved the strategic function to Witbank in order to access the decision makers of industry. To this end the Direction, operation, financial and information technology functions where located in this the Head office. By 2014 Circleway grew its business to Belfast where a Portable skills facility was established, this through the AgriSeta, Teta and Ceta qualifications.

Name: Continuing Education for Africa (Section 21)

Name: Club Leisure Management (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Supported by a handpicked, common-vision management team, the Group has successfully developed a portfolio of leisure and business accommodation clubs with inventory of holiday destinations valued at over R5,5 billion in over 150 resorts, as well as a host of service companies providing members and partners with a full spectrum of services.

The college prides itself on a high standard of teaching and support it offers to students to help them succeed in achieving their goals.

Name: Spectrium (Pty) Ltd
