Description: Providing affordable and quality computer and business training Bridging the gap between theoretical computer/business knowledge and practical experience in the world of work. Pursuing rigorous research in the labour market to ensure that our teaching programmes remain relevant to the priorities of employers. This would go a long way towards supplementing government's efforts of alleviating unemployment. Promoting students' business acumen and self-reliance by imparting project planning and implementation skills; this empowers students with the necessary skills to conceive their own business enterprises, thereby becoming job creators.

Name: St Mary’s Hospital Nursing College
Description:
St. Mary’s Hospital was built in 1927 by a group of Trappist monks who arrived in South Africa in 1882. The monks appealed to women in their home parishes in Europe for assistance and five women responded who formed the foundation of the Missionary Sisters of the Precious Blood which is the Religious Order of nuns that still owns the Hospital today. Today the Hospital is governed by St Mary’s Catholic Mission Hospital Trust.
The Hospital is situated in Pinetown, just off the N3 highway, in the outer district of Ethekwini Municipality in KwaZulu –Natal province. It is a 200-bed, Level 1 District Hospital, serving a population of approximately 1 million and acts as a referral
Hospital for about 16 provincial and municipal primary healthcare clinics as well as 2 community health centres (CHCs).
The surrounding community is largely deprived and the hospital is the only district hospital in the area. To this end hospital has been receiving grant funding from the KZN Department of Health to deliver level 1 public health services to patients.

Name: Stella College (Pty) Ltd
Description: Stella College is a private independent college in Kwa-Zulu Natal (Durban). The main campus is located in the city center of Durban. The Sub-Campuses are also situated in the heart of Mandeni ,Mpangeni, ULundi, Vryheid and Mtubatuba. The campuses are easily accessible by bus, train and taxis. Stella college started operating in February 2007. After it was accredited by HWSETA as our ETQA (Education Training Quality Authority). The institution started with an enrollment of 20 learners annually in the Durban campus, to date, the enrollment is 420 learners annually in the all Campuses.

Name: Successors Training Institute (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Here at Successors Training Institute, we aspire to be the world-class market leader in student training and development and to maintain the profitability of the institution. This is an aspiration that is rapidly bearing both academic as well as actual growth as the institute is also expanding its operating campus space further in this first quarter of 2012!
We have 25 full-time lecturers.  
Satisfaction or money refund guaranteed.
We provide best tools ever.

Name: TaalNet Training Institute (Pty) Ltd
Description: It started as a noble idea by the founding members of the Group, who themselves are living testimonies of the impact of a good education on the future of the young ones. We believe as the late icon of South African independence, the late Nelson Mandela said “Education is the most powerful weapon to change the world”. At TAAL NET we realised just how true that is and what difference quality and objective learning can bring to the world .We incorporated our high Christian values to impact positively on the future generation. It was this desire to leave a positive mark that saw the formation of the Group even with limited resources.

Name: TAG 443-The Academy of Guilds
Description: HE ACADEMY OF GUILDS IS ESTABLISHED AS A VOCATIONAL TRAINING CENTRE. THE AIM OF THE ACADEMY OF GUILDS WOULD BE TO MENTOR OR TUTOR LEARNERS WITH A BALANCED RANGE OF SKILLS IN URBAN ARCHITECTURE AND CRAFTS DESIGN. THE FOUNDATION OF THIS EDUCATIONAL OBJECTIVE IS TO MOULD THE CHARACTER OF THE LEARNER WITHIN THE DISCIPLINE OF DETAIL DESIGNING, SKETCHING AND TO MASTER THE ART OF ARCHITECTURE, CONSTRUCTION AND CRAFTS DESIGN & FURNITURE MANUFACTURING.

Name: Technicol SA (Pty) Ltd
Description:
After realising that a big number of students were denied the opportunity to further their studies because of the lack of space at public Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) Colleges; senior lecturer in Mathematics at Tshwane South TVET College (Pretoria West Campus) the late Mr Eugene van der Walt decided to look for an opportunity to help those that did not receive space. Where after he decided to establish Gauteng Distance College in 1998.

After an overwhelming response throughout the whole country he decided to rename the institution to Technicol SA College.

The name change was important to him to emphasize the availability of education and opportunity to everyone throughout South Africa. This paved the way not only for students that were shown away but also those with working responsibilities to better themselves without having to sacrifice their income. Since the establishment of this family driven company Technicol SA College has become not only the biggest privately owned college but also strives to provide a golden standard of service.

Name: TEK-Mation (Pty) Ltd
Description:
TEKmation (PTY) LTD Training Institute has been in the forefront of engineering and skills education and training in South Africa for the past 12 years. Coming from humble beginnings, TEKmation (PTY) LTD has built a reputation as being the training provider of choice by many organisations and government (SETAs).
Engineering Education, Training & Skills Development is the most sought after as it is one of the scarce skills in South Africa that will be needed to improve and add value to the economy. TEKmation (PTY) LTD is a leader in skills development & training and is registered as a FET and HET with the Department of Education & Department of Higher Education and Training. TEKmation (PTY) LTD has a highly skilled and qualified staff complement consisting of administrators assessors, facilitators, material developers, artisans, technicians and engineers.
TEKmation Training Institute strives to be a cut above the rest with innovative and relevant methods of service delivery. Quality is a core value at TEKmation (PTY) LTD. It is reflected in a passionate approach to training, attention to detail and a commitment to continuing improvement. Each training intervention is followed up with feedback about the service provided and where relevant about participant performance.
Our daily envisage is to provide learners with skills that will set them apart from the average engineer or artisan and create a platform for them to become individuals who will be recognised nationally and internationally . We strive to develop and transfer industry specific skills to students thus increasing their employability after completion of their programme and help them gain an understanding of the world of work and assist with their planning and pursuing their career pathways.
The important part of this training process includes placing learners in industry for workplace training under the mentorship of skilled and qualified artisans for a period of time in their chosen programme.

Name: Design Academy of Fashion (Pty) Ltd
Description:
To provide quality education and training, conducive to the optimal
development of each student by ensuring individual attention and
commitment to learners, in order to maximise their unique potential and
equip them to enter the fashion industry in any fashion field with
confidence, expert knowledge and skills.
FunFact:
Launched in 1999, the Design Academy of Fashion has quickly become one of the top Fashion
schools in Cape Town. Founded by Daphne Treadaway, it was bought in 2006 by former student and
lecturer Bianca Fobian and partner Suzanne Aldridge. Their vision of continued excellence with a
contemporary approach to education has seen the Academy grow in leaps and bounds.

Name: Namibian College of Open Learning
Description: NAMCOL is a State Owned Educational institution created by an Act of Parliament (Act 1 of 1997) to provide learning opportunities for adults and out-of-school youth.
FunFact: NAMCOL won the World Summit Award on the Information Society, 2015 for the Notesmaster Interactive Platform, the NOLNet Education Radio Project through MISA Namibia Media Awards first, second and third places to staff members.

Name: Namibia Business School
Description: The Namibia Business School (NBS) was established in response to the needs of the Namibian market. In 1999, the Founding Vice-Chancellor of the University of Namibia, Prof. Peter Katjavivi, assisted by the former head of the Economics Department, Prof. Mohammed El Toukhy, joined forces with the FNB Foundation and entered into a collaboration agreement with the Maastricht School of Management in the Netherlands to offer an Executive MBA Programme at UNAM. Since the inception of the programme in 2000, more than 175 students have graduated with diplomas and Master’s Degrees in Business Administration (MBA). FNB Foundation, under the leadership of the late Lazarus Ipangelwa, had the vision and commitment to support the programme financially. This commitment from NBS has continued up to this day and has translated into FNB being one of the Founders of NBS
FunFact: A number of individuals played a crucial role in overseeing the UNAM/MsM MBA Programme and nurturing the idea of establishing a full-fledged business school. Their tireless efforts made the establishment of NBS bear fruit. These individuals are Prof. Peter H Katjavivi, Prof. M M El Toukhy, Mr D R Norval, Mr A Aochamub and Ms Y M Yon

Name: Southern Business School Namibia
Description: SINCE OUR INCEPTION IN 1996 WE HAVE COMMITTED OURSELVES TO PROVIDING RECOGNISED SOUTH AFRICAN QUALIFICATIONS TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE BODY OF MANAGERIAL TALENT.
FunFact: Southern Business School has CREATED LEADERS in the private and public sectors since its inception in 1996

Name: PwC Namibia Business School
Description:
The Business School is not a traditional learning institution offering Masters Degrees. We focus on delivering relevant and development solutions based on deep knowledge and experience within PwC's core areas of expertise.

The Business School provides a range of business insights and knowledge-based programmes for directors, executives and managers.
FunFact: The Business School provides, Client Specific Learning Solutions including Training Needs Analysis and Customized Training Programmes

Name: Cornerstone Institute
Description: Cornerstone is an independent, not-for-profit higher education institution engaged in teaching and learning in service of others, to advance human dignity and social justice for all.
FunFact:
Our graduates are employed in good jobs, many earning attractive salaries in their respective specialised fields. Many of our
graduates can be found furthering their studies at honours, masters and Phd Level, counselling within community-based organisations, teaching in schools or pastoring churches.

Name: Durban Computer College (Pty) Ltd
Description: Our mission for DCC campus is the provision of quality education and training to ensure that our graduates are prepared for individual fulfillment and prosperity through employment, job creation and contribution to the National Economy.
FunFact: DCC CAMPUS was founded by the late Mr K.M. Naidoo in the early 1990’s in the vicinity of Grey Street, Durban. The company was purposed to address the dire need for education and training of youth, with emphasis on the information technology (IT), and Business sector. Operation of the campus began with a staffing compliment of less than 10 staff members.

Name: ExecuPrime Business College
Description: We have more than a decade’s worth of experience as a training institute. Our accredited Business College caters for part-time training, with short courses as well as Diplomas and Higher Certifications. As part of our unique value-added services, our fully accredited psychometric Assessment Centre offers Career Guidance, Skills Development analyses and Recruitment interventions.

Name: Face to Face Beauty and Make-Up Design School
Description:
It is the longest established specialist training academy in beauty, make-up design and special effects in South Africa, offering leading, recognized and accredited qualifications in accordance with the national and international requirements.

After 49 years, the mother and daughter team, namely Miss Shirley Wenman and Mrs Nicci Manthe Landman, are still committed to offering the highest level of education in the health and skincare, make-up design, special effects, film and theatre industry.

Name: Faisit
Description:
Established in 2006, faisit (Pty) Ltd is a dynamic, proudly South African company specialising in the delivery of high-quality education and training interventions to learners, companies and training providers.

Our team of staff are qualified professionals with extensive experience across the spectrum of child and adult education. faisit is recognised and accredited as a training provider at several Sector Education and Training Authorities as well as Umalusi.

Name: Felix Risk Training Consults
Description:
Our programmes focus on niche areas of core banking, banking administration, treasury and credit risk management. FRTC provides training by means of specialised initiatives, learnerships and internship programmes. We provide various short skills programmes to government and private companies.

It is our vision at FRTC to become the most successful and preferred training organisation to the Finance and Banking Industries in South Africa.

Name: Festicol  College
Description:
Festicol College has modern teaching and learning process to gather with equipments that make learning easy for learners in fulltime classes or distant education. Come to our camp and weakness the amassing style of education which gives you double assurance to pass your exams.

Full-time learners attend classes every day from Mondays to Fridays, Part-time learners attend classes at evening from Mondays to Fridays and Saturdays classes but Distances learners arrange for revision classes and can attend on Saturdays too.

Name: First Car Care College
Description:
We are an industry based training & repair facility with  partners from within the industry and related sectors.


• Our repairs are done under the supervision of qualified artisans and our training courses are accredited. 

• Our learners have access to and gain practical experience within actual operating workshops associated to the college.Teaching methods used are outcomes based and consist of theory and practical teaching.

The theoretical training is one of facilitation of learning, allowing students to move increasingly towards self-directed learning and critical thinking.

The planned practical placement at various host workshops enables learners to optimize the experiences that will shape their Spray Painting/Automotive Body Repair skills to become competent practitioners.

Learners are mentored by artisans operating in the various workshops where they undergo their periodic practical modules.

Integration of theory and practice is enforced and the students have sustained exposure to dedicated educators and mentors ensuring progressive assessments and constructive feedback systems.

• Our associated employers have the pick of the best successful candidates.

• We offer industry related advanced and refresher training to anyone working in the industry - Both employed and unemployed.

The College is governed by the relevant statutory bodies,the Quality Management System and policies of First Car Care.

Name: Forek Institute of Technology
Description: Forek College is a Further Education and Training (FET) Institute that specializes in courses which are in demand in South Africa and Africa. This unit also specializes in Consulting, Business Analysis, Career guidance.

Name: Gateway City College
Description: ateway City College (“GCC”) is an independent further education and training institution that is accredited with the Department of Higher Education and Training (DHET), Umalusi as well as the Quality Council for Trades and Occupation (QCTO). Gateway City College is a wholly owned subsidiary of Edinvest Holdings (Pty) Limited, a 100% black owned investment company.

Name: Gauteng Central College
Description: Gauteng Central College is a institute that offers the best Marketable and Practical Technical Education Qualifications where all our students graduate with the highest professional and academic exellence.
FunFact: The most Innovative Enterpreneurial Oriented Technical Education Programmes that best equip our students to become very successful self employed practitioners or even employers.

Name: Gauteng Talent Management Solutions
Description: We are solutions driven. We focus on providing quality services to improve organizational effectiveness and operational excellence.

Name: Germiston FET College
Description:
Germiston Fet College is a hub of integrated and creative training and education solutions. Our existence is a result of passion for what we do.

Designing integrated education and education solutions that builds and adds value to services.

We thrive on doing our very best, making sure that we our business partners expections.

Name: Graserkrat Studies
Description: Good Hope Studies was founded in 1995. The idea was to open a language school that was different from all the other schools. We wanted to provide a learning environment which is relaxed and fun to study in. Instead of renting cheap office space in the noisy city centre, we started our first school in a lovely private house in the leafy residential area of Newlands. The school was close to the host families, saving students on travel time. It was also close to public transport and close to the commercial centre of Claremont, an area that offers all amenities like restaurants, supermarkets, banks, cinemas, bars and more. Our students learnt English in the shade of an old oak tree instead of listening to the dull hum of air-conditioning. It turned out that students loved our concept and they progressed much faster than in a conventional environment.

Name: Hatfield Tuition and Skills Development Center
Health Science Academy
Description: Health Science Academy (HSA) is an accredited provider of education and training in the South African healthcare sector and is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Foundation for Professional Development (FPD).

Name: Hydro International
Description:
The cosmetology industry has seen substantial growth all around the globe. As beauty consciousness trends, regardless of demographic or destination, the demand for skilled therapists grows. The Hydro International College is advantageously positioned at the centre of this industry and is intent on providing the very best education and facilitation to learners.
We offer a diverse and ever-expanding full time, part time and modular courses. Our aim is to stay up-to-date with industry demands, whilst enabling learners to enter into programmes suited to their aptitude and abilities. We provide comprehensive training to ensure learners are fully equipped and ready to embark on a fulfilling career within the flourishing beauty industry.

Name: iCalc Training Academy
Description: Our College takes pride in its innovative approach to establishing itself as an institution of excellence; responsive to education and training needs and contributing to the skills revolution in South Africa. In this regard the college has a proven track record with various organisations such as NGOs, Business and Industry, as well as Government Departments.

Name: Ifhlile Training Academy
Description:
Ifihlile Training Academy was established in 2005 as a black owned training provider in South Africa to address the need for skilled technicians within the Air Conditioning & Refrigeration industry, particularly amongst the historically disadvantaged individuals.

From 2005 Ifihlile grew with leaps and bounds and today we are a respectable and well established training provider. This is primarily attributed to our professional culture of conducting our business, the staff we have and the wonderful clientele we've developed.

Name: IH Cape Town Language Institute
Description: International House Cape Town (IH Cape Town) is part of the International House World Organisation, one of the largest and oldest group of language schools in the world. Founded in 1953, International House is a global network of 160 schools in over 50 countries teaching English and Modern languages to both foreign and local students. International House schools employ over 5800 teachers, teach more than 200,000 students and train approximately half of all CELTA graduates in the world.

Name: Ikage SD College - Germiston
Description: kage SD College is a REGISTERED Private Further Educational Training service provider and Artisans training center established in January 2008, Dully with the Department of Higher Education and Training South Africa 2010/FE07/023, 2016/FE07/001, Examination Centre number 899998851; MICTSETA LPA/00/07/690 also with Council for Quality Assurance Nated/15/0142  SDP/1220/16/00105 Germiston & Springs Campus vis versa; UMALUSI Registration number FET 00658PA . Our main Campus is based in Germiston and other Campus in Springs , South Africa. Having operated under some small successful partnerships in prior years, directors decided to start a formal juristic person by the name ISDC. Since then the college have grown substantially in Nated Engineering Qualification, and Nated Management sciences Qualification, NQF LEVEL 3 & 4 IN Information Technology end user computing and system development, we also currently do matric rewrite for old and new syllabus framework. and other disciplines. ISDC was given birth due to the high PASS rate at different higher distance learning institutions such as UNISA, INTEC to mention but a few.

Name: Immaculate College of Commerce and Engineering
Description: The Immaculate College of Commerce and Engineering is a Private FET Institution with the principal aim of training manpower in vacational education covering different areas of academic discipline. It was first incorporated as a close corporationin 2005 and later as Limited liability company(PTY) LTD in 2009 with its core business in education & training. The College, though incorporated in 2005, started operation in 2009. It has tremedeously found its niche in impacting academic knowladge in the field of commerce & engineering.

Name: Impi Training
Description:
Home

Independent Media & Print Institute staff has been training for large media companies in excess of 20 years, most notably of which Naspers, later to become known as Media24. 

More recently, our staff have worked for the Media24 / South African printing College Joint Venture which was known as Cross Media Trainin – Cape Town (C. M. T.)

Name: Imperial London College of Commerce Engineering and Business College
Description: To Provide a  high quality , comprehensive education and empower all students to apply their acquired skills and knowledge in a very friendly, accommodating and constructive way so as to lead productive lives and to become a contributing member of a global economy.

Name: In Touch Community Development and Project Managers
Interlink English Center
Description: Established in 1998, Interlink School of Languages is registered as a close corporation, registration no.1998/051341/23. It is an independently-owned language school. Interlink School of Languages is a smaller school committed to excellent service standards. Throughout its twenty-year existence, it has built a solid foundation and an excellent reputation, receiving the majority of its students by word of mouth. Interlink is ideal for your more independent, discerning clients looking for quality and a high level of personal attention.

Name: International Trade Institute of Southern Africa
Description: Established in 1996 as a Section 21 (‘not for gain’) company, the International Trade Institute of Southern Africa (ITRISA) NPC specialises in assisting organisations and individuals to develop the knowledge and competencies needed to succeed in today’s highly competitive international trade arena.

Name: IQ Academy
Description: iQA believes in our country and in its people, and we believe education is a cornerstone to strengthen each one, to take their place to build a great nation.

Name: Life Healthcare Group
Description: To create a skilled workforce for Life Healthcare and the healthcare industry, in order to provide cost-effective, quality and competent patient care.

Name: Management College of Southern Africa
Description: MANCOSA programmes promote high levels of independence through innovative learning and assessment interventions. You can expect a carefully integrated mix of lectures; access to well-designed self-study materials and online learning resources.

Name: Ribolla Learning Academy (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Ribolla FET Learning Academy is a Further Education and Training Institution whose principal commitment is to provide comprehensive educational opportunities in various fields, skills and empowerment being our main focus.

Ribolla FET’S intent is to educate students and workers who will participate creatively and play pivotal role in the growth of the economy.
This is why we think of the entire Limpopo province as our campus to connect students to the arts, business, entertainment and professional communities that abound here and feed our students aspirations
FunFact: Ribolla FET Learning Academy contribute in the human resource of this country in transforming the workplace by providing training aimed at reskilling the workforce to better respond to the demands of the economy.

Name: Accenture Skills to Succeed
Description: Anticipating and preparing for the impact of digital technologies on the workforce is an urgent issue. Our corporate citizenship initiative, Skills to Succeed, advances employment and entrepreneurship opportunities for individuals around the globe. We are leveraging digital innovation to drive impact at scale and help close skills and employment gaps for vulnerable and marginalized people around the world.

Name: Africa Internship Academy - Youth Energy and Power Professionals
Description: A youth employment accelerator in Ghana, is a self-sustaining social enterprise that trains higher education students and graduates to gain entrepreneurial and employability skills: and proceeds to assign mentors to them: and connect them to employers looking for entry-level talents.

Name: Afrika Tikkun
Description: We were founded in 1995 by the late Chief Rabbi Cyril Harris and Philanthropist/Businessman Dr Bertie Lubner. Initially, the day to day needs of children was a priority but soon after, the organisation evolved into one focused on overall development. Renamed MaAfrika Tikkun and later Afrika Tikkun, our approach was refined and reformulated into the Cradle to Career 360° model. This Model is aimed at providing education, health and social services to young people and their families through centres of excellence in South African townships. Our main goal is to create a sustainable future for the youth of South Africa and the credibility of this cause won the support of the organisations Patron-in-Chief  in memoriam, Nelson Mandela. Since then, we have built 4 centres of excellence across Gauteng and 1 in the Western Cape

Name: Ashley Kriel Skills Development Centre
Description: The Ashley Kriel Youth Leadership Development Project is located within the Building an Inclusive Society Program of the Institute for Justice and Reconciliation. The project engages youth in dialogues on various platforms from which to promote conversations on issues that are pertinent to youth activism, leadership and development. The Project aims to encourage, nurture and further develop the ability of young people to engage critically with their social context. By connecting a cross-section of youth from various sectors of society, the Project aims to generate meaningful dialogue through which personal and historical perspectives are acknowledged and inclusive narratives are explored.

Name: CapaCiti
Description:
The Cape Innovation and Technology Initiative (CiTi) was established in 1999. Over the past 20 years, CiTi has played an integral role in catalysing and supporting the Cape Town tech ecosystem, now recognized as the most productive on the African continent.

In 2018, both CiTi’s Entrepreneur Development and Skills Development (CapaCiTi) programmes have expanded to support entrepreneurs and youth across the country, and on a Pan-African scale.

Name: Code4CT
Description: Code for Cape Town (Code4CT) is a programme that introduces young girls to basic web building skills and exposes them to opportunities in the Information and Communication Technologies (ICT) sector. Participants are trained in web development, design principles, as well as courses in professional development. Code4CT aims to inspire a generation of young girls who are well-prepared with a toolkit of technical and soft skills in order to achieve high impact in the workplace.

Name: CodeX
Description:
codeX is a full time, one year coding program in Cape Town that trains and places bright young talent as software developers.

We’re looking for problem solvers who have the aptitude and attitude to learn to code, whether you have matric, a university degree or already have work experience.

Name: Digify Africa
Description: Delivering demand-driven digital skills training

Name: Digital Academy
Description: The Digital Academy recruits motivated young people with a raw talent for Web and software development. They learn practical, hands-on development skills that are needed in the real world.

Name: EOH Youth Job Creation Initiative
Description: The EOH Youth Job Creation Initiative is an on-going learning curve for us at EOH, and each day we try and improve on our models structure and scalability to ensure that it impacts the lives of more young people who are unable to access the economy of SA.

Name: Explore Data Science
Description:
The three EXPLORE Academy founding members, Shaun Dippnall, Aidan Helmbold and Dave Strugnell have all been working as Data Scientists in disguise throughout their careers as Actuaries.
The EXPLORE Academy aims to be a place where a combination of these business and analytical skills can be practised and refined: to produce world-class data scientists.

Name: GoldPE
Description: The gold Youth Peer Education Model has been implemented over the last 12 years, and draws on best practice global research, together with the learnings of pioneering organisations who have been implementing youth development programmes and peer education in Southern Africa for over a decade

Name: Guarantee Trust Corporate Support Services - Work Readiness Programmes
Description: Guarantee Trust’s programs focus on the selection, training, placement and monitoring, where required, of HDI (Historically Disadvantaged Individuals) matriculants, graduates and under-graduates into the workplace.

Name: Innovation Hub CoachLab Leadership Skills Development Programme
Description: CoachLab® is a youth skills development programme managed by The Innovation Hub in collaboration with prominent industry partners, government and academia. The programme is committed to the development of a diverse skills base in the ICT, Engineering, Green and Media sectors. The aim is to instill business principles and the value of innovative and entrepreneurial thinking amongst the participating youth through mentorship by programme partners.

Name: International Youth Foundation
Description: For more than 25 years, we’ve led and sustained coordinated action to harness the talent and potential of the world’s youth, now numbering 1.2 billion. At the heart of our efforts is building partnerships, initiatives, and curricula that prepare young men and women to succeed as citizens, employees, entrepreneurs, and change-makers.

Name: Learn to Earn
Description: All Learn to Earn courses include a 2-day pre-orientation workshop and Life Skills course as well as a basic finance skills programme. An optional Discipleship programme is also offered, Learn to Earn currently makes use of the Alpha Course.

Name: Life Choices
Description: A bold movement investing in youth to tackle inequality.

Name: Mentec Foundation
Description: Mentec Foundation is an NPO founded in 2006 focusing on Industry Specific ICT, BPO,Mining, Portable Skills (Public Works Programmes) and Entrepreneurship skills. A global aspirant African company with an aim to become a leader in Africa. Mentec Foundation has created work opportunities for more than 20 000+ beneficiaries since inception and continues to provide enterprise development solutions to Corporate South Africa and Government.

Name: Mlab
Description: At mLab we offer a range of different programmes to support new skills development, solutions development and enterprise development.

Name: Fachs Business Consulting and Training
Description: In comparison to its competitors, Fachs Offers bespoke services. Fachs is one of the few providers that offers full services packages from the design of its offering , development of material and delivery. the essential approach to the customer service means involving the customer at the service design stage and attention for clients requirements. We analyse problems in conjunction with our clients, recommending cost effective solutions, and oversee the implementation and evaluation of these solutions. Fachs priority is reliability, quality service, conformance to high local and international quality standards and requirements. Fachs follows a rigorous for step customer engagement process.

Name: Global English Academy
Description: Global English Academy (GEA) offers courses in general English and English for specific purposes. Students get to enjoy the beauty of Cape Town and the surrounding areas while learning English with GEA.

Name: Injabulo Community College
Description:
Injabulo Community Care renders care based on the following values:
Innovative Integrated care to all its clientele / beneficiaries
Compassionate care that has a Christian base and is
Cross Cultural in order to meet the needs of the divergent groups in South Africa
Admission of patients who are terminally ill to ensure a dignified death and bereavement as well as support to orphans,
family and friends.
Rehabilitation of the patient after prolonged illness, trauma and accidents
Evaluation of the care and the services rendered on a continual basis, to ensure and promote Quality care.

Name: Coastal KZN TVET
Description: This college is a merger of the former Durban Technical College, Swinton Road Technical College and Umlazi Technical College. It includes former Umbumbulu and Appelsbosch Colleges of Education.
FunFact: It is the largest College in KwaZulu-Natal, currently averaging about 15 000 full time equivalents and about 800 staff members

Name: Lephalale
Description:
Lephalale TVET College is a public college registered in terms of the CET Act No: 15 of 2006. The college has two campuses in the Waterberg District of Limpopo Province.

The College is accredited by UMALUSI, the quality assurance body responsible for general and further education and training institution, with regards to quality assurance of programmes.

Name: Letaba TVET College
Description: The post school learning environment offers a lot of opportunities for all our students, you will be exposed into the work situation through work integrated learning (WIL) and experiential learning.

Name: Mopani South East TVET College
Description: Mopani South East TVET College was established in 2003, when Phalaborwa Technical, Sir Val Duncan Technical and Mapulaneng Technical merged as part of the National transformation process that transformed Higher Education landscape in South Africa.
FunFact: These technical colleges then became campuses offering a variety of programmes in Business and Engineering Studies.

Name: South African Military Health Service Nursing College
Technicon South Africa for Higher Education (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Technicon S.A is a private institution for Further Education and Training institution in the town of Bronkhorstspruit.

It offers the NATED qualifications of the DHET in Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Sciences N1- N6, and Business Studies N4 – N6, and a few short courses such as Basic Computer Practice, Event Planning, Creative Writing, Understanding and Application of English in the Job Environment, etc.

Name: Mediclinic
Description: Mediclinic (Pty) Ltd is registered with the Department of Higher Education and Training until 31 December 2019 as a private higher education institution under the Higher Education Act, 1997. Registration certificate no. 2008 HEO7/006.
FunFact: To contribute to the development of skills relevant to healthcare services delivery nationally

Name: Mukhanyo Theological
Description: Mukhanyo is a multi-denominational Reformed Christian institute that strives to glorify Christ through serving African churches!  We are dedicated to preparing men and women for the manifold ministries of Christ through His church, by providing holistic, in-depth Bible teaching and training to church leaders, pastors, teachers, missionaries and young people.
FunFact: Our lecturers offer a high level of quality instruction on various levels of academic education to students from a variety of backgrounds

Name: Nazarene Theological College NPC
Description: It is a community of Christian scholars and learners seeking to present a view of life and man, based on the Word of God, that will guide, stimulate, and equip learners to realize a life of redemptive and reconciliatory service to their fellows, either as pastors, missionaries, evangelists, Christian educators, counselors or lay persons.
FunFact: The mission of Nazarene Theological College is to prepare men and women, laity and clergy, in the African context for ministry and leadership in the local, district, and global church. NTC promotes a Christian lifestyle and is distinctively Wesleyan-holiness in orientation.

Name: ESRI South Africa
Description:
Esri was founded to help solve some of the world’s most difficult problems. We are the global market leader
in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and have helped customers unlock the full potential of data to
improve operational and business results. Esri builds ArcGIS, the world’s most powerful mapping and spatial
analytics software, which operates on desktop, server and mobile platforms with a scientific-based approach
to solving problems in real time.

Name: Future Nurses Nursing School
Description:
Future Nurses Nursing School (Pty) Ltd “FNNS” was established in 
November 2003 and provides equal opportunity education and training 
to the Nursing sector. The school educates 100 learners in two intakes 
per annum and has 5 staff members.

Name: Institute of Accounting Science
Description: The CTA is a tough qualification, and requires total commitment by both students and staff. Why not take a group of the top academic minds, give them the best teaching tools and technologies, place their focus on teaching the CTA programme only, developing new and better content and teaching methods, and let them create the best CTA programme in South Africa?

Name: Gauteng City College
Description: The main aim of the college is to help students to excel in an FET environment providing them with the necessary skills needed in the ever changing industry or to gain university entrance.
FunFact: Firstly, we aim to improve visibility and accessibility in the market, while imparting academic knowledge in the fields of commerce, engineering, humanities and information technology.

Name: HC College
Description: HC College (Previously known as HC Varsity) is a tertiary educational institute providing quality education by means of classroom based lectures and Supported Learning (correspondence). The Mission of HC College is to ignite the potential of all students to become leading professionals in their chosen fields. We are focused on service delivery and student well-being, therefore our facilitators are leaders in their fields, our staff are passionate about student success and student well-being is always the driving force behind any decision.

Name: Academy for Facilities Management
Description: he Academy for Facilities Management (A4FM) is a specialist higher education institution focused on facilities management (FM) education and training.  Allowing student to consolidate their experience within the industry, A4FM offers a Higher Certificate in Facilities Management (NQF5) which progresses to an Advanced Certificate in Facilities Maintenance Management (NQF6).

Name: Academy of Sound Engineering
Description:
Academy of Sound Engineering
is a privately owned company registered as Academy of Sound Engineering (Pty) Ltd
that currently provides education and training in the audio engineering, television and
screen media fields. It caters both for the new entrant with little to no knowledge of
the industry, and for sound engineering, television and screen media professionals to
enhance or upgrade their skills and knowledge.

Name: ACT Cape Town (Pty) Ltd
Description: Film and acting Academy

Name: SA Academy of Applied Competence (Pty) Ltd
Description: Mission for SAAAC is to provide quality education to our target market * Provide a variety of of faculties with a broad choice, making us the first choice to students * Affordable products of a high quality * Enhance the levels of study to ensure the student stays with us * Stay ahead with modern technology * Entice students to buy into the brand, thus enhancing the bottom line felling part of the company * Become aware of our opposition and continuously refine our approach by: - Measuring our performance against key indicators - Analysing the feedback from our customers and other interested parties - Responding promptly to internal and external influences that may affect our business

Name: Thasullulo FET College (Pty) Ltd
Description: As Vocational Institution, Thasululo FET College offers a range of vocational programmes that are responsive to the development needs of the South African Region, using both combination of theory and practical.
FunFact: To Empower and Grow People by Providing Essential Vocational Knowledge and Skills.

Name: The Cape Town School of English CC
Description:
The Cape Town School of English, just outside the City centre, is a language school specialising in teaching English as a Foreign Language (EFL). Our students register to do short (2 weeks) or long (six months to 1 year) courses.
Students come from all parts of the world.

Many young (and not-so-young) people wish to travel to South Africa to see and experience our rainbow nation – a world in one country. As part of their travels or holidays, they also plan on doing a short English course. This may be for study or work purposes and the time periods could vary from 1 week to 2 months or more. Many of our students study English with the purpose of doing an International English exam, to enable them to do further studies in South Africa.

Name: The Digicall Learning Academy (Pty) Ltd
Description: Operating since 2003 in South Africa and recently expanding to Australia and the UK, with more than 1 800 employees in the group.

Name: The Institute of Health Risk Managers
Description: The Institute of Health Risk Managers is an independent training provider specialising in the healthcare industry. The South African healthcare system consists of a public and a private sector. Each sector has the same basic elements – patients, doctors and other healthcare providers and funders. The relationship between each of these players differs for each of the sectors. However, the goal is the same – good patient outcomes with limited resources. The dynamic and evolutionary nature of the healthcare industry, brought about by the increased demand for limited health care resources within the constraints of government’s goal of universal access to quality healthcare for all its citizens has changed the landscape significantly.

Name: The International Hotel School (Pty) Ltd
Description: We offer nationally and internationally recognised Diplomas. International Hotel School is registered with the South African Department of Higher Education and Training as a Private Higher Education Institute.

Name: The Language Lab CC
Description: Since 1953 International House has been committed to continuing teacher development. We have been at the cutting edge of course design in teacher training programmes and, as a result, our teachers are well known for their creativity and professionalism. All IH Johannesburg teachers have the CELTA (Certificate in English Language Teaching to Adults) awarded by Cambridge University. Many are also DELTA (Diploma in English Language Teaching to Adults) qualified. Most of our teachers have taught overseas and have experience with students from many different cultural backgrounds.

Name: The S A J Competency Training Institute (Pty) Ltd
Description: The SAJ was established in 1998 and based in Wadeville, Germiston. This reputable entity was established under the proprietorship of two honorable gentlemen by the names of Mr. Seabata Samuel Nhlapo and partner Mr. Johannes Christiaan Greeff. Over the 20 years of our establishment, we have gained recognition as one of the best training centers reckoned for its high standards and Quality Artisans.

Name: Tioxide Southern Africa (Pty) Ltd
Description: Tioxide Southern Africa (Pty) Ltd. is based in Kwazulu Natal, South Africa. Tioxide Southern Africa (Pty) Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Tioxide Europe Ltd

Name: WW.IT-IQ Training and Solutions (Pty) Ltd
Description: We invest in people by delivering educational and IT services and committing ourselves completely to the task of developing people.  Our philosophy is that IT is for people and should add value to people’s lives. In education, our philosophy is that people are individuals and need to be developed to their full potential.
FunFact: Our Alumni students who have completed this programme are very successful in the IT Development field within industries ranging from financial and banking, insurance, medical, agricultural to retail - to name but a few.

Name: Word in Action Ministries on behalf of Team Impact Christian University
Description: Word in action Ministries is a Christian which started when word in action Bible college implemented the teamwork Bible College.
FunFact: For Bible studies

Name: Sakhikamva College (Pty) Ltd
Description:
Sakhikamva College is located in Mthatha region which is in the Eastern Cape Province under the O.R. Tambo District Municipality. The region currently contains the highest concentration of unemployed youth. The aim of the College is to uplift the region by offering the best quality educational services to empower the youth to become independent once they complete their studies at our College and be able to start their own businesses or become highly effective employees and business owners.

Sakhikamva College (Pty) Ltd is registered as a private College with The Department of Higher Education & Training (DHET) under the Continuing Education and Training Colleges Act 16, of 2006 (Reg No. 2018/FE07/041) to offer Vocational Education, Training and Development programmes. The College is fully accredited by The Quality Council for Trades and Occupations (QCTO), Accreditation Number SDP 1222/17/00311 until 11 August 2022 to offer Report 191/Nated Programmes N4-N6, the College is in the process of finalizing its accreditation process with Umalusi to offer N1-N3 Programmes and various SETA’s such as Services SETA, PSETA and FP&M SETA.
FunFact: The Managing Director of Sakhikamva College is Ms Noluthando Makade. Ms Makade was the co-owner of Eastern Cape Technical & Commercial College when this College was taken over by new management in 2008 until 2016

Name: Afrikaanse Protestantse Akademie (Die) NPC
Description: We develop leaders academically in Afrikaans who strive for a life of classical Christian beauty, harmony and wisdom with others

Name: School of Shipping (Pty) Ltd)
Description: School of Shipping provides certified training in Freight Forwarding and Customs Compliance, Freight Handling and Supply Chain Management. School of Shipping offers quality, affordable adult tuition in maritime studies specifically relating to International Trade.

Name: Camelot International Pty (Ltd)
Description:
Camelot international was established in 1986, and has seven branches countrywide. Excellent education standards and facilities provide the prospective student with maximum opportunity to gain knowledge to reach their full potential in health and wellness.

“We believe in a holistic education where Ethics , Skills, Business and Leadership abilities are developed”.

The key to Camelot’s success is our Dynamic approach to practical and theoretical education helping learners to achieve their potential… we will assist you in pursuit of Knowledge, Needs & Goals and prepare you for your future career.

Camelot International is accredited by the Council of Higher Education (CHE) and South African Qualifications Authority (SAQ
FunFact: Camelot International is committed to excellence and professionalism and is the ideal place to study when it comes to Health and Skincare Training as well as Spa Therapy

Name: Cape Town Baptist Seminary NPC
Description: As far back as 1954, discussions began within Baptist churches in the Western Cape and within the Baptist Union of South Africa for a theological college to be established to meet the needs of churches in the Western Cape. After much investigation and debate, the 1972 Baptist Union Assembly, meeting at King William's Town, approved a motion that a Western Province branch of the Baptist Theological College of South Africa, be established in Cape Town, which would admit students of all races.
FunFact: Under Dr Venter's leadership, the name was changed to Cape Town Baptist Seminary in keeping with the growth and mission of the Seminary in 1992

Name: Akademia NPC
Description: Akademia offers you the opportunity to obtain a qualification, using interactive lessons in Afrikaans, at study centers nationwide and in Namibia.

Name: Cape Town College of Fashion Design (Pty) Ltd
Description: Cape Town College of Fashion Design (CTCFD) provides innovative education that is responsive to the ever changing creative and technological developments in the fashion industry and to produce designers who possess the knowledge, skills, design passion and work ethic to be highly employable in their chosen profession.
FunFact: CTCFD featured in the 2017 Vogue Italia Talent Issue with 2 graduates selected as ‘180 Emerging Designers to Watch’ globally.

Name: Akademiese Reformatoriese Opleiding en Studies (AROS) NPC
Description: Academy Reformational Training and Studies (Aros) is a Christian private higher education institution that trains vocationally driven students to enter the teaching profession with expertise. The education landscape in South Africa is dynamic with many challenges and a huge shortage of teachers. Aros wants to equip students to make a difference in the education landscape.

Name: Da Vinci Institute for Technology Management (Pty) Ltd
Description: The Da Vinci Institute for Technology Management is a School of Business Leadership contributing towards socio-economic development and transformation. The Institute’s purpose is to cultivate business leaders through the core principles of business driven action learning by offering students a personalised journey of self-discovery and co-creation.
FunFact: The Institute derives its passion from developing entrepreneurs and future business leaders who will contribute towards the facilitation of a sustainable and socio-economic transformed society.

Name: Dermatech (Pty) Ltd
Description: We are an established Paramedical clinic with a focus on customer service and results.
FunFact: Come and enjoy the personalised attention you will receive from our beautifully trained staffed, headed by our senior Dermal Therapist with over 25 years experience.

Name: Centre for Creative Education
Description: The Centre for Creative Education is an independent, non-profit, Waldorf-inspired institution based in Cape Town, South Africa. We seek to transform individuals and society by training teachers and performing artists, running a primary school in Khayelitsha, and lending support to over 25 schools in various ways. This happens locally and elsewhere in sub-Saharan Africa. We emphasize artistic creation as a central component of learning and health, and a means of profoundly engaging the liberal arts and sciences, social cohesion and well-rounded thinking.
FunFact: The first Waldorf school was founded in 1919 in Stuttgart, Germany. It started as a school for the children of workers in the Waldorf-Astoria cigarette factory.

Name: Animation School
Description: We have a laser-sharp focus on animation, while drawing on local and international knowledge and experience from related sectors such as art, design and film. This focus gives our students a competitive advantage, because they are able to refine and develop the skills which the animation industry specifically seeks

Name: Baptist Theological College of Southern Africa (The) NPC
Description: Through contact and distance learning to make Evangelical theological education and ministry preparation available primarily to Southern Africa and then the global community

Name: Belgium Campus I ITVERSITY NPC
Description: Belgium Campus is a pioneering ITversity in South Africa that helps to raise the bar through its graduates in the ICT industry. The world is looking to technology for the answers to some of the most fundamental issues and problems we face today, and you can be one of the many individuals who can lead the way in providing these answers.

Name: Berea College of Technology
Description: Berea College of Technology(Pty) Ltd, previously known as Durban Computer College was founded in the early 1990’s near Grey Street, Durban. The company initially began its operations by offering accredited IT and Business-related courses. However due to the demands of the technologically changing market, the Campus was given accreditation to offer courses in the Travel and Tourism, Hotel and Catering, and other sectors.

Name: BHC School of Design (Pty) Ltd
Description: BHC School of Design (Pty) Ltd, formally Boston House College School of Design, is a private college, based in Woodstock, Cape Town, offering higher education in the Interior Design and Decorating fields. The college has been around since 1984 and is currently owned and run by Jeremy & Morgan Volkmann

Name: Boston City Campus and Business College
Description: Boston is a multi award-winning tertiary education institution that has been around for over twenty-five years and has acquired the reputation of not just educating students in their chosen career paths but educating them for life.

Name: Boston Media House (Pty) Ltd
Description: Boston Media House was created to offer students the very best opportunity to study and qualify for a career in the media industry. A world-class learning environment and high levels of technology, together with practical experience, ensure graduates are ready for their careers in this exciting and challenging industry.

Name: Boston Media House (Pty) Ltd
Description: Boston Media House was created to offer students the very best opportunity to study and qualify for a career in the media industry. A world-class learning environment and high levels of technology, together with practical experience, ensure graduates are ready for their careers in this exciting and challenging industry.

Name: Business Management Training College (Pty) Ltd
Description: BMT College is South Africa’s most prestigious distance education college with an impeccable reputation for excellence. The online college has trained numerous successful human resources managers, business managers, supervisors and business owners for over 25 years

Name: SAE Institute of South Africa (Pty) Ltd
Description: SAE Institute was founded in 1976 and has since grown to become the world’s largest, industry-focussed creative media educator with 54 campuses in 26 countries. SAE’s curriculum has been carefully crafted in consultation with leading industry practitioners to meet the requirements of the global creative media industries.

Name: SANTS Private Higher Education Institution (Pty) Ltd
Description: SANTS operates in all nine provinces of South Africa. We have developed a unique training model which is based on the principals of distance education but we have included customised training material and structured support through regular face-to-face contact in our programme delivery. This unique model assists our students to be successful in their studies.

Name: South African Institute for Heritage Science (Pty) Ltd
Description: Heritage science, simply put, comprises all elements of science (analytical techniques, for example) which are mobilized to increase one's understanding of heritage objects. The results are primarily used to guide such objects' conservation, interpretation or management within the context of a private conservation studio, or a research or heritage institution.

Name: UKWAZI SCHOOL OF NURSING
Description:
UKWAZI SCHOOL OF NURSING PTY LTD is accredited  by the SOUTH AFRICAN NURSING COUNCIL as a Nursing Education Institution in terms of the Nursing Act, 2005.

Our Main Campus is in Roodepoort, Gauteng, South Africa and we also have a Sub-Campus in Potchefstroom, North West Province, South Africa

Name: Netcare Education
Description: Netcare Education, a registered private higher education institution, comprises two faculties, with campuses in Johannesburg and Pretoria in Gauteng, Durban North in KwaZulu-Natal, Port Elizabeth in the Eastern Cape and Cape Town in the Western Cape. The Faculty of Nursing and Ancillary Healthcare (FNAH) provides formal education and training in the fields of nursing and ancillary disciplines, and the Faculty of Emergency and Critical Care (FECC) provides formal education and training in the field of emergency and critical care as well as first aid training for members of the public.

Name: University of Mpumalanga
Description: The University of Mpumalanga (UMP) is situated in the scenic Province of the rising sun, a context for staff and students’ inspiration. UMP was established in 2013, and enrolled the first cohort of 169 students in February 2014 in three programmes, namely Bachelor of Education (Foundation Phase Teaching), Bachelor of Agriculture in Agricultural Extension and Rural Resource Development and Diploma in ICT.  Rapid and gratifying growth has been experienced since the establishment of the University.  The University now offers 26 qualifications, to a total of 4200 students in 2020.

Name: Tsiba Education
Description: TSIBA is a unique social enterprise which shows what's possible when business education invests in people. The TSIBA social enterprise includes a Business School, Ignition Academy and Education Trust working together to return highly sought after people and successful small business enterprises.

Name: Sol Plaatje University
Description: The Sol Plaatje University (SPU) in Kimberley draws on the distinctive strengths and heritage of the Northern Cape, stimulating provincial and national development and has the potential to inject new life and purpose into Kimberley and the Northern Cape – a place bursting with energy, attracting people from all over Southern Africa and from other continents.

Name: Hyperion Dev
Description: Our educational model is proven to work. Work 1:1 with one of our expert code reviewers who will review your code and provide comprehensive personal coding feedback - making it easy to master your chosen interests in tech.

Name: The Academy of Aviation
FunFact: The Academy of Aviation (Pty) Ltd is our holding company and all  operations are run through TAOA Training (Pty) Ltd.  The Academy of Aviation has been in existence for 13 years and TAOA Training established in January 2019.  Our key business is upskilling in the aviation industry. Initially our operations were based at Lanseria International Airport. The company moved premises in January 2019 to allow for better facilities and to be able to accommodate our students, encompassing that philosophy that students stay on the premises, and live, eat and breathe aviation for the duration of their training.

Name: Johannesburg Institute of Engineering and Technology (Pty) Ltd
Description: Welcome to Johannesburg Institute of Engineering & Technology (pty), at JIET you enjoy face-to-face tuition, practical learning, full time & short courses. The institute offers you with career path that is relevant with job market requirements globally today. Let us be your partner to your exciting lifelong learning experience with JIET.

Name: Jeppe College of Commerce and Computer Studies (Pty) Ltd
Description: Jeppe College is a nationally recognized FET Private Service provider, fully accredited by Umalusi and registered under the Private Further Education and Training Act, 2006 (Act 16 of 2006) as Private Education Service Provider by the Department of Education. We also offer internationally recognized qualifications.

Name: Ekurhuleni Artisans and Skills training Centre (Pty) Ltd
Description: Ekurhuleni Artisans & Skills Training Centre equip the students with the essential skills in a workshop environment over a period of 15 days, or shorter which means that the students will be competent to start work as an artisan immediately after completing the course.

Name: Gene Louw Traffic College
Description: Gene Louw Traffic College was officially opened on 15 September 1989 and has, since then, trained many traffic officers, municipal police officers, examiners of vehicles and examiners for driving licences throughout the Western Cape, South Africa and other parts of southern Africa (e.g. Botswana).

Name: Mediclinic Higher Education
FunFact: The Mediclinic Higher Education and Training institution vision is to be respected for providing world-class training, leading to the development of safe practitioners delivering excellent patient care.
Description: Our mission is:  To deliver measurable quality training outcomes, governed by sound educational principles, evidence-based practice and adherence to legislation. To contribute to the development of skills relevant to healthcare services delivery nationally.

Name: Blulever Education
Description: We believe that trade training should not only be rigorous but also well-rounded.  We train so that apprentices can not just do the job - but can do it well, thrive, and add value to your business.  Apprenticeships that work.

Name: Mentec Foundation
Description: Mentec Foundation was founded in 2006 focusing on Industry Specific ICT, BPO, Portable Skills (Public Works Programmes), Mining, Agriculture, and Enterprise Development. A global aspirant local African organization to become a leader in Africa. Mentec Foundation has created work opportunities for more than 85 500+ beneficiaries since its inception and continues to provide enterprise development solutions to Corporate South Africa and the public sector. Mentec has delivered training for more than 440 000+ in townships, megacities, rural and semi-urban areas across all provinces.

Name: RISE
FunFact: Enjoy living in spacious rooms and experience fantastic on-site facilities all located only steps away from campuses. At RISE Student Living our student accommodation is designed exclusively for student living, making sure you have everything you need to make the most of your time at university. Students thrive in our communities, where they have access to top-of-the-line amenities, modern suites, and dedicated management.
Description: Enjoy living in spacious rooms and experience fantastic on-site facilities all located only steps away from campuses. At RISE Student Living our student accommodation is designed exclusively for student living, making sure you have everything you need to make the most of your time at university. Students thrive in our communities, where they have access to top-of-the-line amenities, modern suites, and dedicated management.
